With Michael Jordans fame came relentless pressure and in inability to even go outside his house without being mobbed. In the Episode 6, Jordan is shown growing weary of the spotlight.
Now its been revealed the Chicago Bulls superstar at least tried to keep … [+1071 chars]

articles.author: NZ Herald
articles.title: Blues under fire for Jacinda Ardern tweet - NEWS.com.au
articles.description: Super Rugby side under fire for Jacinda Ardern tweet
articles.content: Super Rugby franchise the Blues have received backlash from fans after what some labelled a "disrespectful" social media post referring to New Zealand Prime Minister Jacinda Ardern as "Aunty Cindy". The New Zealand government yesterday announced that professi… [+1383 chars]

articles.author: Paul MacInnes
articles.title: Players to air concerns to Premier League executives over restart - The Guardian
articles.description: Top-flight players are to hold talks with Premier League executives next week, before any attempt to restart the football season can be signed off
articles.content:
Top-flight players are to hold talks with Premier League executives next week, before any attempt to restart the football season can be signed off.
Players are to be given the chance to air any concerns over Project Restart in a video-conference call likely … [+2493 chars]

articles.author: Eric Woodyard
articles.title: Hacking of Giannis Antetokounmpo's accounts being investigated - ESPN Australia
articles.description: Giannis Antetokounmpo's social media accounts have been hacked, prompting an investigation.
articles.content:
NBA MVP Giannis Antetokounmpo's social media accounts were hacked Thursday afternoon, prompting an investigation by the Milwaukee Bucks.
A series of expletive tweets were posted from Antetokounmpo's Twitter account; his agent, Alex Saratsis, told ESPN that A… [+1439 chars]

articles.author: Sam Goodwin
articles.title: 'So much respect': Erin Molan addresses Andrew Johns 'feud' - Yahoo Sport Australia
articles.description: Erin Molan has moved to put rumours of a rift with Andrew Johns to bed.
articles.content:
Erin Molan has addressed an alleged feud with Andrew Johns in a new interview, praising the NRL legend after months of nasty rumours.
The Sunday Telegraph first reported last year that Johns walked out on his role on Friday night football because of an awkwa… [+3084 chars]

articles.title: The Last Dance: Was Scottie Pippen right or wrong in refusing to go back into Game 3 of 1994 Eastern Conference Semifinals? - Sporting News AU
articles.description: One of the most debated topics of Scottie Pippen's career isn't whether he would have won a title without Michael Jordan. It's a moment from Game 3 of the 1994 Eastern Conference Semifinals that he may want to have back.
articles.content:
There's no doubt that Scottie Pippen is one of the best players in NBA history. He's a Hall of Famer with six championships to his name and many looked to him as the best perimeter defender the game has ever seen. 
But in 1994, when the spotlight was on Pipp… [+9951 chars]
